title: 3dReHo
description: 3dReHo calculates Kendall's W per voxel using neighborhood voxels from 4D time series data set.

reho_output.title: ReHo Output File
reho_output.description: Output file containing ReHo/Kendall's W value per voxel.

chi_square.title: Chi-Square Output File
chi_square.description: Optional output subbrick containing Friedman chi-square value per voxel.
